features.additionalInfo: Access is available to online banking features for the product

fees.name: Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
Payable at settlement of new loan, and may be payable at substitution of 
security or when adding a new security

fees.name: Legal Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable at settlement to cover solicitor's documentation costs

fees.name: Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
Payable if valuation required per property
Applies to standard single residential dwellings to $1 million in Metro 
locations and $500,000 in Regional locations 
(maximum land area 2.2ha/5 acres)

fees.name: Top-Up Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable at settlement when increasing loan borrowings

fees.name: Switch Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
Payable if Gateway agrees to vary the Loan Agreement on existing Gateway 
loan as follows:
Product switch (e.g. from variable rate to a fixed rate)
Repayment switch (e.g. P&I to Interest Only)
Split (e.g. into part variable rate and part fixed rate)

fees.name: Security Variation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if Gateway agrees to vary the security on an existing loan

fees.name: Additional Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
Payable at cost if we or you decide to obtain an additional valuation report (which 
we may do at any time)

fees.name: Annual Package Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable at settlement and then again on each anniversary. Nil for Standard Investment Loans.

fees.name: Split Loan Account Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Two loan accounts (i.e. Variable & Fixed) free. Fee for subsequent splits

fees.name: Rate Lock Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
Payable at application for Rate Lock in the prevailing fixed rate, valid for 90 days from request date.0.15% of locked loan 
amount

fees.name: Early Repayment Adjustment (ERA)(break costs)
fees.additionalInfo: Early Repayment Adjustment (ERA) (break costs). Payable if Gateway suffers a loss when loan is repaid in full during a fixed interest rate period. Unascertainable (ERA formula available upon request)

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Inv Home Loan 5yr Fixed Rate  P&I
